entity.name: concept
entity.query: select c.concept_id, c.concept_code, c.concept_name, c.concept_class_id, c.domain_id, c.vocabulary_id, c.standard_concept, c.invalid_reason, d.domain_name, v.vocabulary_name from Vocabulary_20190123.dbo.concept as c join Vocabulary_20190123.dbo.domain as d on c.domain_id = d.domain_id join Vocabulary_20190123.dbo.vocabulary as v on c.vocabulary_id = v.vocabulary_id
